person.note: Li(2) Dongyang [28691] MS,. 181.4820-4825. Chaling ZZ (1525), p. 1007, 1040. SKQSZM, volume 2, p. 1167, volume 4, pp. 3632-3. He has three extant nianpu by Cui Jie (崔傑), Zhu Jingying (朱景英), and Fa Shishou (法式壽).
